name: AVVideoCompositionRenderContext
desc: An object that defines the context in which custom compositors render pixel buffers.

items.name: func newPixelBuffer() -> CVPixelBuffer?
items.desc: Returns a pixel buffer to use for rendering.

items.name: var renderScale: Float
items.desc: A scaling ratio that is applied when rendering frames.

items.name: var renderTransform: CGAffineTransform
items.desc: A transform to apply to the source image.

items.name: var size: CGSize
items.desc: The width and height for the rendering frames.

items.name: var edgeWidths: AVEdgeWidths
items.desc: The width of the edge processing region on the left, top, right, and bottom edges, in pixels.

items.name: struct AVEdgeWidths
items.desc: A structure that defines edge processing region widths.

items.name: var pixelAspectRatio: AVPixelAspectRatio
items.desc: The pixel aspect ratio for rendered frames.

items.name: struct AVPixelAspectRatio
items.desc: A structure that defines a pixel aspect ratio for a rendering context.
